publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7739 Dave Thompson: Congratulations to the Old Manse—That the Parliament offers its congratulations to the Old Manse Bed and Breakfast in Invermoriston on being awarded the title of Best B&B in the World at the recent Travellers’ Choice Hotel Awards organised by TripAdvisor; understands that these awards are unique because they are based on the personal experiences of millions of travellers from all over the world; believes that this accolade is due to the hard work and dedication of the owner, Julie Mitchell, and her staff; considers that the award is well deserved and acknowledges the excellent customer service that Julie and her staff offer to customers, and looks forward to the Old Manse continuing in the same manner for many years to come. Supported by: Gil Paterson*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Stewart Maxwell*, Brian Adam*, Maureen Watt*, Jamie McGrigor*, John Wilson*
S3M-7739 Congratulations to the Old Manse (lodged on 19 January 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Bob Doris*
